private  void RoundHand.determinePlay()
          instructs all players to evaluate their best approach to playing this hand, given their dealt tiles
private  int RoundHand.processDiscard(int discard, int turn, java.lang.String playertypename)

private  int RoundHand.resolveClaims(int[] interested, int turn, int discard)
